post:
To celebrate our **[Sydney Launch](http://news.dediserve.com)**, we've reopened our LET Deal as follows for just 24 Hours 
- 
_Offer will close on Friday 19th June at Midday GMT._

![](http://news.dediserve.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/sydney-2.jpg)

LET Special 

* 1 Intel Xeon E5 CPU
* 1GB RAM
* 20GB Enterprise SSD Storage
* 10GB Snapshot Storage (NAS)
* 100Mbps Internet Uplink
* 2TB Monthly Transfer
* 1 IPv4 Address (free internal and IP6 where available)

Direct Cart Link https://manage.dediserve.com/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=9

Just $5.50 / €5.00 / £3.75 per month or $55 / €50 / £37.50 per year
* _Choose your preferred native currency to pay in._

Included at no additional charge - per server you build:

* 100Mbps Uplinks, Free 1Gbps Private LAN, 
* External Firewalls
* 2TB Outbound transfer, Free Inbound
* Snapshot Backup and Custom Template Engine
* 24 / 7 / 365 Comprehensive Support
* Permanent KVM console to all servers
* Free Global AnyCast DNS Platform
* Comprehensive API, iOS and Android Apps

Explore Speedtests and LookingGlass at http://lg.dediserve.com
